sourcesContent:
<template>
<!--  导航区-->
  <el-container>
    <el-header>
      <Navigation/>
    </el-header>
<!--    内容区-->
    <el-main>
      <router-view></router-view>
    </el-main>
  </el-container>
</template>

<script>
  import Navigation from "./components/Navigation";
  export default {
    name: 'App',
    components:{
      Navigation,
    },
    methods:{
      pushShow(router){
        this.$router.push({
          name:'home',

        })
      }
    },
    mounted() {
      this.$router.push({
        name:'home',

      })
      this.$bus.$on('router',(router) => {
        this.pushShow(router)
      })
    }
  }
</script>

<style>
</style>
